title: Soccer Superstar Cristiano Ronaldo’s Binance Lie Detector Test: From World Cup Dreams to NFT Ventures
description: Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) are unique digital assets that are verified using blockchain technology. Unlike cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin or Ethereum, which are interchangeable and identical to each other, each NFT has distinct information that makes it unique. title: Man Plans to Sue City Over Refusal to Dig for 7,500 Lost Bitcoin in Landfill
description: James Howells, a bitcoin enthusiast who misplaced 7,500 bitcoin (BTC) in a South Wales landfill, is gearing up to take legal action against the local city council for barring his efforts to unearth the missing hard drive from 2013. title: Vitalik Buterin X account hacked as crypto scam posts increase
description: On Sept. 9, Dmitry Buterin, father to Ethereum (ETH) co-founder Vitalik Buterin, announced on X that his son’s account on the social network had been hacked.
